section.title: Importing Tags for a Virtual Machine from a CSV File

procedure.title: To Import Tags for a Virtual Machine from a CSV File

step.para: Make sure the CSV file is in the required format.
Click on the Settings accordion, then Region, then click on the Import Tags tab.
Click Choose File to go to the location where the file is located.

note.para: If there are any problems with the file, such as an incorrect column name, unknown virtual machine, unknown tag, or multiple values for a tag that should have only one, an error message will appear in the console for those records.
